summary_templates.data_scientist: Data Scientist with 10+ years of experience in machine learning, deep learning, and statistical modeling across finance, insurance, and technology sectors. Proven track record of deploying end-to-end ML pipelines including GNNs, reinforcement learning, and time-series forecasting models that drove measurable business outcomes. Currently pursuing M.S. in Computer Science (Cybersecurity) at NYIT Vancouver. Proficient in Python, SQL, R, TensorFlow, PyTorch, and scikit-learn.
summary_templates.ai_consultant: AI/Data Strategy Consultant with 10+ years bridging advanced analytics and business outcomes across multiple industries. Experienced in designing and deploying AI-driven platforms—including RAG pipelines, NLP chatbots, and agentic workflows—that transformed operations for enterprises such as MetLife and Uber. Background in management consulting (PwC) combined with deep technical expertise in ML/DL, enabling effective communication with both executive stakeholders and engineering teams.
summary_templates.product_analyst: Product Analyst with 10+ years of experience leveraging data-driven experimentation, causal inference, and user segmentation to optimize product strategy. Led A/B testing programs, pricing experiments, and growth analytics at Uber China, contributing to market share expansion from 5% to 30%. Skilled in SQL, Python, R, and statistical modeling with a strong foundation in translating complex data insights into actionable product recommendations.
summary_templates.data_analyst: Data Analyst with 10+ years of experience in statistical analysis, data visualization, and business intelligence across finance, technology, and consulting. Expert in SQL, Python, R, and BI tools with a proven ability to translate complex datasets into actionable insights. Experience spans building dashboards, conducting hypothesis testing, and supporting data-driven decision-making for organizations including Uber, PwC, and private equity firms.

education.institution: New York Institute of Technology — Vancouver

experiences.title: Research Data Analyst
experiences.company: Biomedical Data Research Lab, Oregon Health & Science University (OHSU)

core: Developed computational models to analyze metabolic pathways in cancer cells, focusing on glutamate-to-glutathione flux and its impact on tumor antigen presentation.
Integrated multi-omics data (genomics, transcriptomics, metabolomics) to correlate metabolic alterations with gene expression profiles, identifying potential therapeutic targets.
Implemented machine learning algorithms to predict patient responses to metabolic interventions, contributing to personalized treatment strategies.
Created data visualizations of complex biological datasets to facilitate hypothesis generation and interdisciplinary collaboration.

experiences.title: Head of Quantitative Analysis
experiences.company: Hainan Gaff Sail Private Equity Fund Ltd.

ml_infrastructure: Led the development of an end-to-end quantitative research and algorithmic trading infrastructure using Qlib, AutoGluon, Backtrader, and Flask for model development, backtesting, and deployment.
Utilized SHAP for model interpretability, enabling transparent decision-making and regulatory compliance.
ml_models: Deployed LightGBM with tree embeddings, MLPs, and autoencoder-based feature transformations for alpha signal generation.
Built Graph Neural Networks (GNNs) incorporating domain priors and structural constraints to capture relational dependencies in financial data.
Implemented Monte Carlo Dropout and Bayesian approximations for uncertainty-aware portfolio optimization.
Applied reinforcement learning (Actor-Critic) for intelligent trade execution and adaptive trading strategies.
Developed TabNet models for stepwise feature selection with attention-based interpretability.
advanced_research: Researched contrastive learning for enhanced representation learning in graph-based financial contexts.
Implemented Snapshot Ensembles to approximate deep ensemble performance at reduced computational cost.
Applied Darts framework for probabilistic and deep learning-based time series forecasting.
Experimented with Model-Based Reinforcement Learning to dynamically adjust trading policies in response to evolving market regimes.

experiences.title: General Manager / Founder
experiences.company: Shenzhen Gaff Information Technology Services Ltd.

core: Founded and managed a data consulting firm providing services to mid-sized internet companies in data product development, data-driven operational optimization, and M&A advisory.
Designed data infrastructure and analytics solutions for clients, enabling data-driven decision-making and operational efficiency improvements.

experiences.title: Chief Operating Officer
experiences.company: Shiyibei Technology Ltd. (AI startup — Ctrip, Qunar, Sequoia Capital as lead investors)

ai_platform: Led the development of an AI-driven sales platform for insurance, incorporating predictive modeling, lead scoring, and intelligent workflow automation — achieving a 2.5x sales conversion rate increase (0.2% to 0.5%) upon MetLife implementation.

Designed and deployed a Heterogeneous Graph Neural Network for modeling complex relational networks among customers, products, agents, and pricing — enabling precise recommendations and higher customer engagement.
nlp_agents: Co-developed 'Xiaobei', an NLP-powered customer-facing chatbot delivering personalized insurance recommendations via natural language generation (NLG) and contextual understanding.
Co-developed 'Erdangjia', an AI assistant for sales agents automating workflows, lead follow-ups, and customer segmentation through reinforcement learning-based prioritization.
Integrated sentiment analysis and emotion-aware strategy generation to dynamically tailor responses based on real-time customer feedback.
product: Contributed to product iteration and UX optimization of an AI-based auto insurance comparison tool by integrating NLP-based recommendation engines and dynamic pricing algorithms.

experiences.title: Senior Dops / City Lead / South China Lead

growth_analytics: Formulated data-driven growth strategies by analyzing marketplace metrics, A/B test results, and competitor intelligence, contributing to Uber China's market share expansion from 5% to 30% within two years.
experimentation: Led experiments on rider/driver price elasticity, pricing decoupling, and dynamic pricing strategies using causal inference and regression modeling.
Designed and evaluated dispatching algorithms to optimize ETA-based ranking, reducing unfulfilled requests and increasing trip completions.
Applied A/B testing and uplift modeling for campaign targeting across funnel conversion, referrals, LTV, anti-churn, and call-back programs.
ml_models: Built K-Means clustering models for user segmentation on behavioral features.
Developed Random Forest regression models to predict ride frequency and user retention.
Supported fraud detection using anomaly detection techniques with behavior-based scoring and outlier analysis.
analytics_tools: Utilized SQL, R, and Python (pandas, NumPy, scikit-learn) for in-depth data analysis and hypothesis testing.
Developed interactive R Shiny dashboards for city teams to monitor KPIs, forecast supply/demand, and evaluate promotional effectiveness.
Participated in time series modeling using ARIMA and Exponential Smoothing for demand forecasting.
collaboration: Collaborated with product managers and engineers from HQ Marketplace and China Growth teams to localize and launch high-impact features.

ma: Supported Haier's acquisition of Sanyo — Won the 2012 China M&A Service Award. Led 2 rounds of due diligence across 9 entities, clearing $13M in liabilities and retaining 100+ key talents.
Developed financial evaluation and actuarial models, deducting $31M pension deficit from deal price and securing a $22M pension fund.
consulting: Conducted market research, growth planning, competition analysis, and sales & marketing consulting for Fortune 500 clients including Danone, Volkswagen, and Daimler.
Assisted CITIC PE in healthcare industry investment with commercial due diligence and post-deal operational enhancement.
Supported Haier's global Workday cloud system implementation across 22 entities in 18 countries covering 7,000+ employees.
recognition: Recognized as 'Exceptional' consultant across PwC Greater China for two consecutive years.

core: Won second prize in the National University Academic Competition for empirical research on rural healthcare satisfaction using statistical analysis.
Contributed to Stanford REAP research under the guidance of Scott Rozelle at the Stanford Foreign Study Institution.
